duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain a nurturing and safe environment for children and staff.
Assist in curriculum development and program implementation.
Oversee and manage day-to-day operations of the preschool.
Provide leadership and guidance to teachers and staff.
Foster open communication and collaboration among the team.
Ensure compliance with state licensing and accreditation requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Early Childhood Education or related field (Master's preferred)
